author: hodldwon
content: Tim mentioned on Bankless that rinkeby is not moving to POS before the mainnet merge, but instead the three others‚Ä¶ any reason why not rinkeby too?

author: ralexstokes
content: rinkeby is geth only so would be a lot of extra coordination for not as much value

author: ralexstokes
content: i think the maintainers were already looking for a reason to deprecrate it anyway in favor of say sepolia and this was a good time to do so
